plot: Zoologist and musician Paulo Vanzolini travels from Belém to Manaus sailing the Amazon River, exploring the wildlife of the place. The documentary is about this 34-day trip.
title: No Rio Amazonas
plot_es: Zoologist and musician Paulo Vanzolini travels from Belém to Manaus sailing the Amazon River, exploring the wildlife of the place. The documentary is about this 34-day trip.
plot_en: Zoologist and musician Paulo Vanzolini travels from Belém to Manaus sailing the Amazon River, exploring the wildlife of the place. The documentary is about this 34-day trip.
